title: Geneva talks end without resolution to Israel and Iran's weeklong war
description: Israel and Iran have struck at one another again a week into their war as President Donald Trump weighs U.S. involvement.

title: Trump weighs Iran action and appeals court rules on California National Guard: Morning Rundown
description: Donald Trump said he would decide whether the U.S. should take action in Iran within two weeks.

title: Trump tax cuts: The impact on Medicaid and the welfare state’s future
description: Donald Trump’s tax cuts would throw millions off Medicaid and food stamps, while making it harder to grow America’s safety net in the future.

title: Appeals court lets Trump keep control of National Guard troops deployed to Los Angeles
description: An appeals court allowed President Donald Trump to keep control of National Guard troops he deployed to Los Angeles following protests over immigration raids.

title: Markets flatline amid Trump’s delay on Iran and potential Fed cuts in July
description: The White House said Thursday evening that President Donald Trump would decide on whether he’d strike Iran within two weeks.

title: Focus groups: Latino Trump voters diverge on deportations but largely still back the president
description: Some divides are emerging among swing-state Latinos who voted for President Donald Trump when it comes to his approach to mass deportations, according to new focus group conversations with some of these voters, who nevertheless remain broadly supportive of the president.

title: TikTok Ban Update: When Donald Trump's Latest Extension Will Expire
description: President Donald Trump has once again extended the deadline for TikTok's ban, this time to September 17, 2025. It gives ByteDance more time to avoid a U.S. shutdown.

title: E. Jean Carroll says Trump could've won his case against her if he did one thing
description: E. Jean Carroll beat Donald Trump in court, but she thinks it didn't have to go that way.Carroll appeared on a live video with former federal prosecutor Joyce Vance, who asked Carroll if she thinks things could have gone differently if Trump had testified in the defamation trial.Carroll starts by ac...

title: In Virginia and New Jersey governor's races, Democrats reprise a 2018 roadmap for opposing Trump 2.0
description: Democrats have spent the early months of Donald Trump's second presidency trying to find the right messages and messengers to counter an aggressive administration.

title: Appeals court denies DOJ request to replace Trump in defamation case
description: An appeals court on Wednesday ruled against the Justice Department's attempt to replace President Donald Trump as the defendant in a multimillion-dollar defamation case.
